page.title: 08GAMES CHILDREN PLAY
page.content: We went to Ballifield School to interview the youngsters about the games they play at break. The age group was 5-7 years. Katie, a 6 year old, liked playing hopscotch,skipping and kiss catch. When she was asked if she knew any game rhymes she answered, "The big ship sails through the alli -alli- o" David, a 5 year old, liked playing football and pulling, which is a game like tug of war in which the strongest stays standing up. When he was asked if he knew any game rhymes he answered, "No, they're for girls." Chris, a 5 year old, liked playing ball games like football.
